ext_description.message: Ekstensi baru yang mengembalikan penampilan Twitter lama.

following_btn.description: This one is used in button showing that user is following someone.

following.description: This is used in list showing who user follows. Try to keep this word equal or less than 9 characters

followers.description: This is used in list of users followers. Try to keep this word equal or less than 9 characters

who_to_follow.description: Max 19 characters, you can use word 'People' if no space

terms.description: Shortest word that you can find for Terms of service

privacy.description: Shortest word that you can find for Privacy policy

home.description: This is for navbar menu. If no appropriate word, you can use something like Feed or Timeline

open_newtwitter.message: Buka halaman ini di Twitter baru

thank_you.message: Terima kasih untuk menginstal OldTwitter!! Saya harap anda menyukainya. Cek $AT1$Pengaturan Ekstensi$AT2$!

must2variants.message: You must have at least 2 poll variants.

delete_bookmarks.message: Apa anda yakin ingin menghapus semua penanda anda? Tindakan ini tidak dapat dikembalikan.

delete_list_sure.message: Are you sure you want to delete this list?

tweeted_like.message: meng-tweet sesuatu yang mungkin anda suka

you_may_also_like.description: Max 26 characters, you can use word 'People' if no space

timeline_not_authorized.message: Anda tidak diizinkan untuk melihat linimasa pengguna ini.

january.description: Used in 'Born January 1'. You can move $NUMBER$ on left if it sounds better in your language like that.

remove_from_followers.description: This button unfollows person from you, not unfollows you from them

remove_from_followers_sure.message: Apa anda yakin dengan menghapus @$SCREEN_NAME$ dari pengikut anda?

remove_from_followers_warn.message: INI AKAN MENGHAPUS MEREKA DARI DAFTAR PENGIKUT ANDA, BUKAN DAFTAR MENGIKUTI ANDA.

able_in_future.message: Mereka akan bisa mengikuti anda lagi kedepannya.

no_results.message: Tidak ada hasil. Coba mengganti sesuatu di kiri layar?

any_words_example.message: Example: cats dogs - includes either "cats" or "dogs"

min_retweets_example.message: Example: 10 - tweets with at least 10 retweets

show_colors_in_timeline.message: Show custom link colors of users in home timeline

save_preferred_quality.message: Save preferred video quality. If this is set to true, OldTwitter will save your preferred video quality and use it (or use closest quality to preferred one). If it's off, OldTwitter will select highest quality.

by_pressing_sync.message: By pressing Sync button your profile link color will be sent to colors database and shown to other extension users.

color_years_ago.message: If you have set Twitter link color before (years ago, when it was still a thing), it'll override your old color.

css_var_override.message: Override default CSS variables. Type them as --some-variable: property. Split by newline.

css_var_list.message: See list of default CSS variables here.

custom_css_text.message: Custom CSS to add on every page.

send.description: Max 5 characters, if no word keep it in English

cant_send.message: Anda tidak dapat mengirim pesan kepada pengguna ini.

max_count.message: Anda hanya dapat mengunggah hingga 4 gambar atau 1 video atau 1 gif

unsupported_video.message: Browser anda tidak mendukung format video ini.

circle_limited_tweet.message: This tweet is visible only to people who are in @$SCREEN_NAME$'s trusted friends circle.

limited_tweet.message: Tweet ini tidak memiliki batasan tentang siapa yang dapat membalas.

retweet_sure.message: Are you sure you want to retweet this tweet?

delete_sure.message: Apakah anda yakin ingin menghapus tweet ini?

long_vid.message: Video ini lebih panjang dari 10 detik. Apakah anda yakin untuk mengkonversinya, mungkin akan lag

language.description: Please add English 'Language' word in parentheses in addition to translation

everyone.description: Used to say that tweet will be shown to public (shown to Everyone), can use word Public if it fits better

youre_not_interested.message: You're not interested in this topic.

display_sensitive_content.message: Uncensor media that was marked by Twitter to possibly contain sensitive content automatically

no_big_font.message: Disable large font for short/popular tweets

unsupported_emoji.message: Browser anda tidak mendukung emoji warna.

emoji_search_description.message: When search results are available, press up or down to select and enter to choose.

skin_tone_description.message: When expanded, press up or down to select and enter to choose.

when_theyll_tweet.message: When they do, their Tweets will show up here.

thank_you2.message: Thank you for using OldTwitter! It took lot of time and effort coding it, you can support me by following me or $AT1$donating$AT2$. I would be very thankful.

notifications_error.message: Some notifications couldn't be loaded due to errors.

tweet_error.message: Some tweets couldn't be loaded due to errors.

error_instructions.message: Please copy text below and send it to $AT1$issue tracker$AT2$ or $AT3$my email$AT2$. Thank you!

show_original_images.message: Selalu perlihatkan gambar dengan kualitas sebenarnya (mungkin akan lag di komputer yang lambat)

pitch_black_mode.message: Mode gelap gulita (only when dark mode is enabled)

no_tl_tweets.message: You're not following anyone so there's no tweets found! Change your timeline type to 'Algorithmical' in OldTwitter settings.

replying_to.description: Used for mention list. Use 'Mentions' if translation sounds bad in your language.

display.description: Used for display settings (fonts, colors, style, etc)

retweet_hotkey_warn.message: You've just pressed T key which is hotkey for retweeting. Do you want to retweet this tweet? If you'll press confirm you won't be shown this warn again.

no_unfollowers.message: You don't have any unfollowers yet!

recent_unfollow_update.message: Unfollows were updated less than 15 minutes ago.

deleted_accounts.message: Seems like everyone in this list deleted their account.

black_mode_link.note: You can name this OLED mode too

follow_to_see.message: Only confirmed followers have access to @$SCREEN_NAME$'s Tweets and complete profile. Click the "Follow" button to send a follow request.

use_new_icon.message: Gunakan logo baru sebagai icon tab

update_timeline_automatically.message: Perbarui linimasa secara otomatis di tweet baru.

hide_likes.message: Hide like, retweet and reply count on tweets

block_sure_desc.message: They will not be able to follow you or view your Tweets, and you will not see Tweets or notifications from @$SCREEN_NAME$.

why_you_cant_see_block_user.message: You can't follow or see @$SCREEN_NAME$'s Tweets.

do_you_want_see_blocked_user.message: Are you sure you want to view these Tweets? Viewing Tweets won't unblock @$SCREEN_NAME$.

logout_title.message: Are you sure you want to logout?

logout_desc_1.message: OldTwitter only works when you're logged in.

logout_desc_2.message: If you don't have any other accounts in list you'll be redirected to login page. Are you sure?

hide_tweet_sure.message: Are you sure you want to hide this tweet?

me.description: You should probably use word 'Profile' in your language

use_old_default_profile.message: Set default profile picture to Egg

enable_hashflags.message: Enable hashtag icons (might slow down page loading a little)

uncensor_graphic_violence_automatically.message: Uncensor media with graphic violence content warning automatically

uncensor_adult_content_automatically.message: Uncensor media with nudity content warning automatically

uncensor_sensitive_content_automatically.message: Uncensor media with sensitive content content warning automatically

reset_colors_sure.message: Are you sure you want to reset all colors?

chrono_help.message: Classic reverse chronological timeline ("Following"), shows most recent tweets and retweets on top with nothing else added.

chrono_no_retweets_help.message: Same thing as first one but with no retweets.

chrono_retweets_help.message: Same thing as first one but only shows retweets.

chrono_social_help.message: A mix of both reverse chronological and algorithmical timelines, ocassional 'someone liked' and 'someone follows' will be added in between chronological tweets.

algo_help.message: Old algorithmical timeline, shows tweets that Twitter thinks you'll like. Version 1 is older version of this timeline, it doesn't seem to have any rate limits (or they're very big) but it lacks labels for why tweet was added to timeline.

algov2_help.message: Algorithmical timeline ("For You"), shows tweets that Twitter thinks you'll like.

reset_settings_sure.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?

pccss_not_eligible.message:
You currently don't have profile CSS customization access.

If you want to have a cool profile with custom font, colors, background and everything else that everyone will be able to see, you can become extension supporter (it's not only donations).

Click here to learn more.

pccss_eligible.message: You have access to profile CSS customization!

pccss_congrats.message: Congratulations, you were given access to profile CSS customization! Only a very small percentage of OldTwitter users have access to this, enjoy and stay awesome!

css_theme_hint.message:
Please, do not publish 'eye-bleeding' or anyhow deceiving styles (for example making Follow button very big or something like that), you will lose your access for doing so. Always test how your style looks on both dark and light modes.

Your CSS will override local styling that user has set.

You can only use i.imgur.com for images and fonts.googleapis.com for fonts (and fonts from here).

You can see list of CSS variables here.

To target specific theme you can use .body-dark, .body-pitch-black (pitch black mode will also include .body-dark) and .body-light classes.

profile_colors_moved.message: Link color synchronization moved to your profile (pencil button on left from Edit profile button).

profile_must_be_public_to_auth.message: Your profile must be public to sync for the first time, then you can private it back.

no_draft.message: You don't have any draft saved yet!

invalid_auth_token.message: Your auth token was invalid and was removed. You can try again now, if this error persists contact @d1mden.

replying_to_and.description: For some languages that use address terms

replying_to_comma.description: For some languages that use address terms

open_notifs_as_modal.description: Modal is a small window that opens on top of page

enable_iframe_navigation.message: Enable experimental page-preserving navigation, this will make it possible to click on links and go back to previous page without reloads. This is experimental and might break and be laggy.

modern_ui.message: Use 2018 Twitter design, includes round buttons and symbols

show_exact_values.message: Display the exact number of retweets, likes, followers, etc.

hide_timeline_types.message: Hide timeline type switch on home page

translate_not_in_list.message: Translate when not in language list

dont_pause_videos.message: Don't pause videos when scrolling from view

show_user_previews_on_mobile.message: Show user previews on hold (this can be annoying)
show_user_previews_on_mobile.description: This option only appears on mobile

separate_text.description: This option appears in three-dot menu of tweets only on mobile and makes text bigger and adds padding on top and bottom on tap

leave_conversation.message: Are you sure you want to leave/remove this conversation?

autotranslation_help1.message: This function can find the tweets and trigger translation automatically, without having to click the button manually.

autotranslation_help2.message: To use it, select autotranslation mode and set the language list. The tweets that meet the conditions will be automatically translated.

autotranslation_help4.message: "Translate when in language list" with no languages set cause function to be disabled (default).

autotranslation_help5.message: "Translate when not in language list" with no languages set cause every tweet to be translated. It's better to add languages you know to not needlessly translate them.

follow_system_settings_dark_mode.message: Follow system settings for dark mode

replacer_post_to_tweet.description: This string will be used to replace word 'post' with 'tweet' in various places. If, in your language, this replacement is very context-based, you can add multiple substitutions and separate them with a | (example: posts->tweet|post->tweet). On the left side of a substitution, use the word for 'post' that Twitter officially uses in your language (open notifications and you'll probably see 'someone liked your post' in your language, find that word (in this case 'post') and place it on the left side, before the '->', and then on the right side insert the translated 'tweet' word, so when replaced it'll look like 'someone liked your tweet'. The substitution terms on the left can also be regex expressions (don't insert them as '/expression/g' though, just 'expression'). For example, 'epic$' will only replace the word 'epic' if it's at the end of a sentence (because the $ character indicates the end of a string in regex). However, if, even after all these substitutions, it sounds bad in your language, you can ignore this.

replacer_repost_to_retweet.description: If 'retweet', either the noun or the verb, is different than 'tweet' in your language, you should change this. If this replacement is very context-based in your language, you can also add multiple substitutions and separate them with a | (example: repost->retweet|ripostato->ritwittato). The substitution terms on the left can also be regex expressions (don't insert them as '/expression/g' though, just 'expression'). For example, 'epic$' will only replace the word 'epic' if it's at the end of a sentence (because the $ character indicates the end of a string in regex).

localize_digit.description: Non-CJK dont need to translate this message, just copy and paste

replacer_liked_to_favorited.description: This string will be used to replace word 'liked' with 'favorited' in various places. If, in your language, this replacement is very context-based, you can add multiple substitutions and separate them with a | (example: liked->favorited|likeeeeeeeeed->favoriteeeeeeeeed). On the left side of a substitution, use the word for 'liked' that Twitter officially uses in your language (open notifications and you'll probably see 'someone liked your tweet' in your language, find that word (in this case 'liked') and place it on the left side, before the '->', and then on the right side insert the translated 'favorited' word, so when replaced it'll look like 'someone favorited your tweet'. The substitution terms on the left can also be regex expressions (don't insert them as '/expression/g' though, just 'expression'). For example, 'epic$' will only replace the word 'epic' if it's at the end of a sentence (because the $ character indicates the end of a string in regex). However, if, even after all these substitutions, it sounds bad in your language, you can ignore this.

enable_extension_compatibility.message: Enable extension compatibility mode (only enable if you want to make some extension work with OldTwitter, if it still doesn't work (and most likely won't) disable this again, because this option can make page buggy/laggy)

disable_data_saver.message: Disable data saver for cellular connection
disable_data_saver.description: This option only appears on mobile

disable_accept_type.message: Disable accept-type when uploading media. This fixes the problem of not being able to access all images on some Android versions.
disable_accept_type.description: This option only appears on mobile

show_follower_counts_in_lists.message: Show users follower counts on follower/following pages.

not_possible_to_see_unfollowers.message: Unfortunately, it's not possible to see unfollowers for accounts with more than 50,000 followers.

loading_all_followers.message: Loading all followers (this will happen once per 24 hours)...

only_show_people_with_followers.message: Only show people with at least $NUMBER$ followers

only_show_people_with_age.message: Only show people with an account that is at least $NUMBER$ days old

user_added.description: This is used when a group admin adds a user to the group chat (display names)

user_left.description: This is used when a user in a group leaves (display name)

user_changed_group_photo.description: This is used when a user in a group changes the group photo (display name)

user_changed_group_name.description: This is used when a user in a group changes the group name (display name)

user_added_you_inbox.description: This is used when a group admin adds you to the group chat (display names, inbox list only)

user_added_you_msg.message:
$A_START$$NAME$$A_END$ added you
There are $NUMBER$ other people in this group
user_added_you_msg.description: This is used when a group admin adds you to the group chat (display names, messages only)
user_added_you_msg.example:
Group Admin added you
There are 6 other people in this group

anniversary_tweet.message:
Do you remember when you joined Twitter? I do!
#MyTwitterAnniversary
